languages.text: "О, а я-то всегда думал{mf||а}, что подданные ждут двух вещей — злоупотребления властью и благословения их детей. Преуспеете в обеих — и можете забыть о нудных трактатах".

traits.locale_text: "О, а я-то всегда думал{mf||а}, что подданные ждут двух вещей — злоупотребления властью и благословения их детей. Преуспеете в обеих — и можете забыть о нудных трактатах".

languages.text: "Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."
languages.original_text: "О, а я-то всегда думал{mf||а}, что подданные ждут двух вещей — злоупотребления властью и благословения их детей. Преуспеете в обеих — и можете забыть о нудных трактатах".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I always thought the subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."
"Oh, I always thought the subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."
"Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."
"Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."
"Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."

languages.text: “噢，我一直认为，臣民只希望他们的君主做两件事情。一是滥用职权，二是祝福他们的孩子。只要把这两件事情都做好，像这种无聊的论文就根本没必要写了。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."

traits.locale_text: “噢，我一直认为，臣民只希望他们的君主做两件事情。一是滥用职权，二是祝福他们的孩子。只要把这两件事情都做好，像这种无聊的论文就根本没必要写了。”

languages.text: «En mi experiencia, los súbditos esperan dos cosas de su soberano: que abuse de su poder y bendiga a sus bebés. Si hace ambas cosas suficientemente bien, no necesitará ensayos tediosos».
languages.original_text: "Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."

traits.locale_text: «En mi experiencia, los súbditos esperan dos cosas de su soberano: que abuse de su poder y bendiga a sus bebés. Si hace ambas cosas suficientemente bien, no necesitará ensayos tediosos».

languages.text: 「ああ、臣民が君主に期待することは2つあるというのが私の意見だ。それはすなわち、権力を濫用することと、赤ん坊を祝福することだ。その両方に成功すれば、退屈な論文は不要になる」
languages.original_text: "Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、臣民が君主に期待することは2つあるというのが私の意見だ。それはすなわち、権力を濫用することと、赤ん坊を祝福することだ。その両方に成功すれば、退屈な論文は不要になる」

languages.text: "Oh, meine Ansicht war immer, dass Untertanen zwei Dinge von ihrem Souverän erwarten – dass er seine Macht missbraucht und ihre Babys segnet. Macht beides, und langweilige Essays werden überflüssig."
languages.original_text: "Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, meine Ansicht war immer, dass Untertanen zwei Dinge von ihrem Souverän erwarten – dass er seine Macht missbraucht und ihre Babys segnet. Macht beides, und langweilige Essays werden überflüssig."

languages.text: « Oh, j'ai toujours été {mf|persuadé|persuadée} que les sujets n'attendent que deux choses de leur souverain : qu'il abuse de ses pouvoirs et qu'il bénisse leur progéniture. Au-delà de ça, tous ces essais ennuyeux à mourir ne valent pas grand-chose. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, j'ai toujours été {mf|persuadé|persuadée} que les sujets n'attendent que deux choses de leur souverain : qu'il abuse de ses pouvoirs et qu'il bénisse leur progéniture. Au-delà de ça, tous ces essais ennuyeux à mourir ne valent pas grand-chose. »

languages.text: "Yönetilenlerin, yöneticilerinin her zaman yapmasını beklediği iki şey olduğunu düşünmüşümdür: Güçlerini suistimal etmeleri ve bebeklerini kutsamaları. İkisinde de başarılı olduğunda sıkıcı tezlerin hiçbir anlamı kalmaz."
languages.original_text: "Oh, it has always been my opinion that subjects expect two things from their sovereign — to abuse power and to bless their babies. Succeed at both, and boring essays become unnecessary."

traits.locale_text: "Yönetilenlerin, yöneticilerinin yapmasını beklediği iki şey olduğunu düşünmüşümdür her zaman: Güçlerini suistimal etmeleri ve bebeklerini kutsamaları. İkisinde de başarılı olduğunda sıkıcı tezler gereksiz hâle gelir."
